content.description:
Propaganda poster of the French Communist party, circa 1950Private Collection/Bridgeman Images

The text reads: “American occupation is war” and “Let us free France from the Atlantic pact!”
content.question: The poster was most directly a reaction to which of the following developments?

choices.label: The Allied invasion of France during the Second World War
American support for French decolonization movements
The American-led United Nations intervention in the Korean War
American troops remaining in Western Europe as part of NATO commitments

content.answer: American troops remaining in Western Europe as part of NATO commitments

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
